comment.author: 18643384@N08
comment._content: Est-ce que ça serait pas plutôt, non loin, l'aqueduc du moulin de Münster-am-Stein ?

comment.author: 21146621@N00
comment._content: This is not a "Pont", it is a "Gradierwerk" (bâtiment de graduation) used to inhale moist air with salt particles. www.youtube.com/watch?v=V3xBXzp5pAU
